entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
